name: NSEntityMigrationPolicy
desc: A policy instance that customizes the migration process for an entity mapping.

items.name: func begin(NSEntityMapping, with: NSMigrationManager)
items.desc: Sets up state information before the start of a given entity mapping.

items.name: func createDestinationInstances(forSource: NSManagedObject, in: NSEntityMapping, manager: NSMigrationManager)
items.desc: Creates the destination instance(s) for a given source instance.

items.name: func endInstanceCreation(forMapping: NSEntityMapping, manager: NSMigrationManager)
items.desc: Indicates the end of the instance creation stage for the specified entity mapping, and the precursor to the next migration stage.

items.name: func createRelationships(forDestination: NSManagedObject, in: NSEntityMapping, manager: NSMigrationManager)
items.desc: Constructs the relationships between the newly-created destination instances.

items.name: func endRelationshipCreation(forMapping: NSEntityMapping, manager: NSMigrationManager)
items.desc: Indicates the end of the relationship creation stage for the specified entity mapping.

items.name: func performCustomValidation(forMapping: NSEntityMapping, manager: NSMigrationManager)
items.desc: Provides the option to perform custom validation on migrated objects during the validation stage of the entity migration policy.

items.name: func end(NSEntityMapping, manager: NSMigrationManager)
items.desc: Performs cleanup at the end of the migration, from any phase of the mapping.

items.name: let NSMigrationEntityMappingKey: String
items.desc: Key for the entity mapping object.

items.name: let NSMigrationPropertyMappingKey: String
items.desc: Key for the property mapping object.

items.name: let NSMigrationEntityPolicyKey: String
items.desc: Key for the entity migration policy object.
